Other.Description: - Rope climb speed increased from 11 to 13
- Rope activation range increased from 2.2m to 2.4m
- Fixed an HTML parsing exploit with builds

Heroes.Description: - Base clip reduced from 24 to 20, Alt Fire now requires 5 bullets

Abilities.Description: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Flame Dash|Size=20}} Flame Dash now has 30% Slow Resistance
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Air Drop|Size=20}} Air Drop self cast time reduced from 2 to 1.3
- Spirit Power DPS scaling reduced from 0.8 to 0.7
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Puddle Punch|Size=20}} Puddle Punch base cast range from 60m to 40m
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Puddle Punch|Size=20}} Puddle Punch T2 damage from +50 to +35
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Puddle Punch|Size=20}} Puddle Punch base cooldown increased from 24 to 28
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Puddle Punch|Size=20}} Puddle Punch now knocks people less high into the air
